items.title: How Coastal Communities Are Prepping For Hurricanes
items.description: As hurricane season rages on, seaside dwellers are finding innovative ways to mitigate storm damage. But it’s a moving target.

items.title: Why Science Says You Should Stop Hitting the Snooze Button, Starting Tomorrow
items.description: Because the snooze button is a symptom, not a cure.

items.title: This Fashion Brand Made $2 Million in Just 48 Hours. Here’s How
items.description: When competitors started to sell dupes of Guizio’s “micro mini skirt,” the founder had a clever solution.

items.title: A Candidate Is Threatening to Withdraw if He Has to Interview
items.description: … and two other tricky workplace dilemmas.

items.title: Don’t Freeze in a Crisis: Steal This Special Forces Trick for Instant Courage
items.description: Special Ops soldiers know that if you don’t want to freeze in a crisis, you need to prepare yourself for courage before one hits.
